titles.title: White House Accountability Act of 2015
To rescind unobligated amounts for White House salaries and expenses.
White House Accountability Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
White House Accountability Act of 2015
Rescinds the unobligated balance of funds made available for FY2015 for salaries and expenses of the White House.
